## Steps

1. Make a branch from the master 
2. Make changes to package components (scripts, data, etc)
3.  Use **`load_all()`** to make the updates available for use.
4.  Use **`document()`** to update the function documentation and NAMESPACE
5.  Use `check()` to make sure there are no errors, correct any warnings, etc.
6. Commit to github.
